summary: Build a searchable database of Milwaukee Brewers cards including imported card images.
architectural_notes: Need data ingestion pipeline for card images + metadata and a searchable index/database for querying.

existing_features.title:
Add an admin-only bulk import workflow to ingest a large Milwaukee Brewers card dataset with images.

Frontend:
- Add a new page/route accessible from the UI (e.g., "Import") that lets an authenticated admin upload:
  1) A CSV file containing card metadata (at minimum: id, year, playerName, brand; optional: serialNumber, cardNumber, cardSeries, notes, isRookieCard, isAutographed, team).
  2) A ZIP (or multiple files) of card images whose filenames map to CSV rows (e.g., by id).
- Provide a CSV template download and clear instructions (English).
- Show import progress, counts (created/updated/failed), and a downloadable error report for failed rows.

Backend:
- Add an admin-restricted endpoint to bulk upsert cards (create if missing, update if exists) and store associated images using the existing blob storage approach.
- Enforce that non-admin users cannot perform bulk imports.
- If team is missing in the CSV, set it to "Milwaukee Brewers" during import.

Update the card catalog UI to behave as a searchable database for Milwaukee Brewers cards and to use the new server-side pagination/search.

- Replace the current "load everything then filter in-memory" approach with React Query calls to the new paginated backend query.
- Keep the existing filter controls (search, year, series, brand, player, rookie, autographed) but apply them by requesting filtered pages from the backend.
- Add a team filter defaulted to "Milwaukee Brewers" and keep it fixed/hidden unless explicitly changed (so the app remains Brewers-focused).
- Add pagination controls (Next/Previous or infinite load-more) and display the total number of results currently loaded plus a "Loading more…" state.

new_feature_requests.summary: Import pictures of all Milwaukee Brewers cards and create a searchable database

Add a backend data field to explicitly label each card’s team and support filtering/searching for a Milwaukee Brewers-only catalog.

- Extend CardMetadata with a required `team : Text` field.
- Extend CardFilters with optional `team : ?Text`.
- Update addCard/updateCard/filterCards (and any other relevant query) to store and filter by team.
- Default team to "Milwaukee Brewers" for any existing card records during upgrade so existing data remains readable.

Implement paginated, server-side searchable queries for cards so the database remains usable when many Brewers cards are imported.

- Add a query method that supports pagination (page size + cursor/offset) and accepts CardFilters plus a free-text search term.
- Return both the page of cards and a next-cursor/hasMore indicator.
- Ensure the query can filter by year, playerName, brand, cardSeries, isRookieCard, isAutographed, and team, and can also apply a free-text search across playerName/brand/cardSeries (case-insensitive).

projectName: Bulk import Milwaukee Brewers card images and make a scalable searchable card database
